jenkins.plugins.ssh2easy.gssh.GsshShellB.shell:
rm -rf /home/repo_for_test.txt sed -i '/222.73.157.67.*$/d' /etc/hosts ping -c 4 zstack.org if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then curl -X POST --data-urlencode "payload={\"username\" : \"jenkins\",\"text\" : \"BAT test for build_mevoco #`cat /home/shuang2/overall_mevoco_build_number.txt`, not able to ping zstack.org on 192.168.200.120, work around added to /etc/hosts\"}" https://hooks.slack.com/services/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 echo "222.73.157.67 zstack.org" >> /etc/hosts fi ping -c 4 zstack.org if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then curl -X POST --data-urlencode "payload={\"username\" : \"jenkins\",\"text\" : \"BAT test for build_mevoco #`cat /home/shuang2/overall_mevoco_build_number.txt`, not able to ping zstack.org on 192.168.200.120, even with work around added to /etc/hosts, need check it manually\"}" https://hooks.slack.com/services/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 fi
yum-config-manager --disable aliepel yum-config-manager --enable epel yum clean metadata yum --nogpgcheck install -y mariadb mariadb-server if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then yum-config-manager --enable aliepel yum-config-manager --disable epel yum clean metadata yum --nogpgcheck install -y mariadb mariadb-server if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo "Use aliepel" curl -X POST --data-urlencode 'payload={"username" : "jenkins","text" : "BAT test for build_mevoco #`cat /home/shuang2/overall_mevoco_build_number.txt`, yum repo epel not working on 192.168.200.120, switch to aliepel for testing"}' https://hooks.slack.com/services/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 else curl -X POST --data-urlencode 'payload={"username" : "jenkins","text" : "BAT test for build_mevoco #`cat /home/shuang2/overall_mevoco_build_number.txt`, both epel and aliepel not working on 192.168.200.120, need manual check"}' https://hooks.slack.com/services/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 fi fi
yum-config-manager --disable alibase yum-config-manager --disable 163base yum-config-manager --enable alibase yum clean metadata yum --nogpgcheck install -y vim if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then yum-config-manager --disable alibase yum-config-manager --enable 163base yum clean metadata yum --nogpgcheck install -y vim if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo "Use 163base" touch /home/repo_for_test.txt curl -X POST --data-urlencode 'payload={"username" : "jenkins","text" : "BAT test for build_mevoco #`cat /home/shuang2/overall_mevoco_build_number.txt`, yum repo alibase not working on 192.168.200.120, switch to 163base for testing"}' https://hooks.slack.com/services/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 else echo "no repo working" curl -X POST --data-urlencode 'payload={"username" : "jenkins","text" : "BAT test for build_mevoco #`cat /home/shuang2/overall_mevoco_build_number.txt`, both alibase and 163base repo not working on 192.168.200.120, need manual check"}' https://hooks.slack.com/services/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 fi fi

jenkins.plugins.ssh2easy.gssh.GsshComman.shell: cd /home/shuang2/ rm -rf zstack-woodpecker zstack-utility mkdir -p zstack-woodpecker tar -x -C zstack-woodpecker -f zstack-woodpecker.tar rm -rf zstack-woodpecker/dailytest/build_zstack.sh mkdir -p zstack-utility tar -x -C zstack-utility -f zstack-utility.tar

if [ -f /home/repo_for_test.txt ]; then echo "fix zstack-woodpecker/zstackwoodpecker/zstackwoodpecker/setup_actions.py" sed -i "s/aliyun/163/g" /home/shuang2/zstack-woodpecker/zstackwoodpecker/zstackwoodpecker/setup_actions.py fi cd /home/shuang2/zstack-woodpecker/dailytest/ chmod a+x /home/shuang2/zstack-woodpecker/dailytest/build_zstack.sh ./zstest.py -b cd ../tools/ sh copy_test_config_to_local.sh rm -rf /root/.zstackwoodpecker/integrationtest/vm/deploy.tmpt
cd /home/shuang2/zstack-woodpecker/dailytest/ rm -rf /tmp/result_120.log /tmp/log_120.tgz ./zstest.py -s basic | tee /tmp/result_120.log tar czh config_xml/test-result/latest > /tmp/log_120.tgz

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: rm -rf /tmp/report.json if [ "${OVERALL_MEVOCO_BUILD_NUMBER}" == "" ]; then OVERALL_MEVOCO_BUILD_NUMBER=`cat overall_mevoco_build_number.txt` fi echo "{\"fields\":[{\"value\":\"zstack-woodpecker:\",\"short\":true},{\"value\":\"`cat zstack_woodpecker_version.txt`\",\"short\":true}],\"color\":\"${COLOR}\"}," > /tmp/report.json cat /tmp/result_120.log | sed -n '/--*$/{:1;N;/--*$/{p;b};N;b1}' | grep -v '\-\-' | awk '{if ($1~/:/) {tttt=$1;gsub(":","", tttt)} else {if ($2!=1) {printf("{\"fields\":[{\"value\":\"%s/%s\",\"short\":true},{\"value\":\"FAIL\",\"short\":true}],\"color\":\"F35A00\"},", tttt, $1, $2, $3, $4, $5)} else {printf("{\"fields\":[{\"value\":\"%s/%s\",\"short\":true},{\"value\":\"PASS\",\"short\":true}],\"color\":\"00F300\"},", tttt, $1, $2, $3, $4, $5)}}}' >> /tmp/report.json echo "{}" >> /tmp/report.json curl -X POST --data-urlencode "payload={\"text\" : \"BAT result(<http://192.168.200.1/mirror/mevoco_ci/${OVERALL_MEVOCO_BUILD_NUMBER}/log.tgz|Log>) against build_mevoco - #${OVERALL_MEVOCO_BUILD_NUMBER}(<http://192.168.200.1/mirror/mevoco_ci/${OVERALL_MEVOCO_BUILD_NUMBER}/|Open>)\", \"username\" : \"jenkins\", \"attachments\" : [`cat /tmp/report.json`]}" https://hooks.slack.com/services/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 mkdir -p mevoco_ci/${OVERALL_MEVOCO_BUILD_NUMBER}/ cp /tmp/log_120.tgz mevoco_ci/${OVERALL_MEVOCO_BUILD_NUMBER}/log.tgz
